Name: Gaze Goggles
LongDescription: Earns Exp. Points every time the Pokémon takes damage. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Venonat and Venomoth.  Finding Gaze Goggles at the Croagunk Swap Shop is very lucky! Make sure you get them before someone else does! An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
